content: Be yourself; everyone else is already takeb

content: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.

content: The sky has never been the limit. We are our own limits. It's then about breaking our personal limits and outgrowing ourselves to live our best lives.
author: Walt Disney

content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

content: The only thing that will stop you from fulfilling your dreams is you.
author: Tom Bradley
